bank.question: Newton's first law of motion
bank.answer: Every body persists in its state of being at rest or of moving uniformly straight forward, except insofar as it is compelled to change its state by force impressed.

bank.question: Newton's second law of motion
bank.answer: The alteration of motion is ever proportional to the motive force impress'd; and is made in the direction of the right line in which that force is impress'd

bank.question: Newton's third law of motion
bank.answer: To every action there is always opposed an equal reaction: or the mutual actions of two bodies upon each other are always equal, and directed to contrary parts.
